bike.description: Specialized E5 AEROTEC, fully manipulated aero tubing, compact Transition design, internal brake and derailleur guides, replacable derailleur hanger

components.description: S-Works FACT carbon aero Transition Speed Zertz, carbon legs, crown, and threadless steerer
S-Works Mindset, 1 1/8" integrated threadless, sealed stainless steel cartridge bearings, carbon 20mm cone with two 5mm carbon spacers
Specialized Transition carbon, aero seatpost with Speed Zertz
Chain stay protector, reflectors, chain catcher, clear coat, owners manual
